import { React, useState, useEffect } from 'react'; function App() { const [firstname, setfirstname] = useState([]); const [lastname, setlastname] = useState(); const [phone, setphone] = useState(); const [country, setcountry] = useState(); const [city, setcity] = useState(); const [citizen, setcitizen] = useState(); const getFirstName = (event) => { setfirstname(event.target.value); } const getLastName=(event) => { setlastname(event.target.value); } const getPhoneNumber=(event)=>{ setphone(event.target.value); } const getcountry=(event)=>{ setcountry(event.target.value); } const getcity=(event)=>{ setcity(event.target.value); } const getcitizen=(event)=>{ setcitizen(event.target.value); } return (
